Title: Relates to military connected youth
Summary: Requires the trustees or board of education of every school district with twenty or more enrolled students who are military connected youth to designate a military education coordinator; provides for the identification of military connected youth; provides for a military student census to determine whether a student's parent is a member of: the armed forces of the United States who is on active duty; the reserve component of a branch of the armed forces of the United States; or the national guard; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add §19-b, Art 14 §§400 - 403, Mil L; add §3245, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law and the education law, in relation to the identification of military connected youth
